about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Precision Metaliks is engaged in trading and manufacturing Aluminium Alloy Wheels and finishing Alloy wheels i.e. cleaning, washing, buffing, polishing, testing, and packing. Its manufacturing unit is situated at Visakhapatnam SEZ, Duvada, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh.

Key Products & Services

  1. Value-added services on Alloy wheels for a major client, Synergies Casting Ltd (SCL). It is also planning to supply finished Alloy Wheels with accessories to the USA market through Silver MetalX INC, USA.
  2. Automated cleaning of Aluminium chips + briquetting into Ingots.
  3. Robotic polishing of alloy wheels i.e. robotic grinding, buffing, automatic media polishing, and 3D polishing.
  4. Other Engineering services i.e. high-end design engineering, product development, prototyping, tooling design, etc.

Competitive strengths

  • Specialized in finishing semi-finished alloy wheels.
  • Low-cost infrastructure and high-end technology.
  • Strong customer relationship.
  • Professional and experienced management team.

faqs.question: What is the Precision Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer:
Precision Metaliks IPO is a SME IPO of 4300000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 19, 2022, and closes on January 24, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Precision Metaliks IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Precision Metaliks IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Precision Metaliks IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Precision Metaliks IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Precision Metaliks IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Precision Metaliks IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Precision Metaliks IPO opens on January 19, 2022 and closes on January 24, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Precision Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: Precision Metaliks IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Precision Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Precision Metaliks IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Precision Metaliks IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Precision Metaliks IPO will be done on Friday, January 28, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 1, 2022. Check the Precision Metaliks IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Precision Metaliks IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Precision Metaliks IPO listing date is on Tuesday, February 1, 2022.
